_sText:
ZM_DESPERADOS
==================
By FireWavezZ
------------------
### www.FireWaLLcs.net

#### original map is cs_desperados by "jackennils"
#### map is edited into zombie mod, perfect for 16-64 players
balanced with indoor, outdoor, some cade rooms, some 1person defend spots and some spot for 6+ players.

CHANGELOG a1:

- fixed doors that stay opened
- fixed some lights
- fixed radio sound coming from wrong place
- added more effects to the cannons
- added prop fade distance for better performance
- added a kill script button for the jail
- changed damage in jail from 999 to 100
- changed some secrets
- deleted console spam when you go to jail
- deleted 1 invalid spawn point
- optimised more, general +20 fps

map size = 24MB + nav file.

###### more info www.firewavezz.blogspot.com

###### thanks to www.firewallCS.net / *-=Leb=-
IP: 206.212.243.130:27015
